name: Aleph
headline: One source of truth for financial data.
description:
Aleph helps top finance teams work with their data in real time. Businesses can automate financial models and streamline budgeting and forecasting with the fastest-to-implement FP&A platform. Aleph eliminates the need to export data from multiple sources by syncing spreadsheet models with data from 150+ integrations, and allows teams to interact with their data in no-code dashboards.

From annual budgeting to ad hoc reporting, scale your financial processes faster with better data without expanding your team. See why over 90% of people who start a trial with Aleph become customers!

## Start quickly, scale infinitely
Purpose-built to quickly meet finance teams where they are and take them to where they want to be.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6793bb3f42d23c59e44f7e2a_Dot%20BG.svg)
Discover your “aha moment” on day one
Skip the multi-month onboarding timelines that plague our industry. With Aleph, you’ll see the value on day one. No other solution can compete with what we deliver.
**Break free from your reliance on other teams**
Take full control over how you consolidate and work with cross-system data. No more waiting in queue for engineering or data teams to lend a helping hand. 
**Multiply your output with the same headcount**
Leverage cleaner data, automated reporting, and deeper insights to multiply your output and impact almost overnight without multiplying your headcount. 
"Implementing Aleph was insanely fast. We did all of our quarter-end reporting with Aleph less than 3 weeks after signing."
Chris Brubaker, 
VP of Finance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6793b97fdfd6c5c765c8a437_postscript_logo.svg.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67aa164fa9eab3e972acef51_679869f3051c640dae9d8267-chris-brubaker-67aa16157e306.webp)
## Automate the manual busywork, elevate the high-value strategic work
Eliminate the manual, time-consuming, error-prone processes that stand between you and the high-value strategic work you were hired to do. 
[Book a demo](https://getaleph.com/</demo>)[Start a free trial](https://getaleph.com/</trial>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6793bb3f42d23c59e44f7e2a_Dot%20BG.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67aa3353427eccb05cf1795c_home-connect-and-sync-financial-data.webp)
Connect & SynC
**Build a single source of truth for cross-system data**
Connect all of your systems with 150+ no-code connectors that seamlessly sync your ERP, HRIS, CRM, and other cross-system data in real time.
[Explore integrations](https://getaleph.com/</integrations>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67aa33580f82e36ba4c3a937_98e08919e30822f706219a0745ccb34c_home-consolidate-and-tranform-financial-data.webp)
CONSOLIDATE & TRANSFORM
**Transform raw data into clean, ready-to-use data**
Give your data structure and purpose with smart logic to map fields, combine tables, run calculations, store metrics, and more.
[Explore transformations](https://getaleph.com/</platform/data-consolidation>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67a05decc6301e5efa232968_78e873564710ccaaad9271e5e928ac17_spreadsheet-add-in1.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67a05dec7d8d410c37270360_cafd8188d3ae98b4543e46030f8f31af_spreadsheet-add-in2.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67a05decdc32e423b23f9a51_a1a3a64a90375155d164340634d071c2_spreadsheet-add-in3.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67a05dec6944dc5b3610f150_cf9937e4d18935173bc7b8b61562d61f_spreadsheet-add-in4.webp)
[Pivot Table](https://getaleph.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Custom Functions](https://getaleph.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Aleph Connect](https://getaleph.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[SQL](https://getaleph.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
AUTOMATE & ANALYZE
Supercharge what is possible using Excel & Google Sheets
Keep using your existing reporting packages and models. Bi-directional spreadsheet add-ins sync your data in real time or on a schedule. Leverage data drill-downs to analyze and understand any cell or movement without ever having to leave your spreadsheets. 
[Explore spreadsheet add-ins](https://getaleph.com/</platform/spreadsheets>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6797be2494272f91758596d5_4.avif)
VISUALIZE & SHARE
Bring your data to life with beautiful, interactive visualizations
Aggregate, spotlight, and share key metrics, trends, and answers across your business, giving stakeholders the visibility they need to stay on track and on target.
[Explore dashboards](https://getaleph.com/</platform/dashboards>)
"I've been born and bred in FP&A for almost 20 years, and kudos to Aleph who built the tool I've always wanted."
Brandon Sullivan,
CFO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/679f04aabb0889cd6f16945d_2x-sdn-bhd-1573466903.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67a051cf630f451979351290_brandon-sullivan-2x.webp)
# Power your processes with better, faster data
Unlock the confidence and process improvements you need to go from data to decision faster. 
### Financial Reporting & Close
Put your routine financial reporting and closing processes on autopilot, turning days of work into simple click-of-the-button tasks.
[Learn More](https://getaleph.com/</solutions/financial-reporting>)
### Collaborative Budgeting
Streamline your budget planning and tracking processes with a collaborative solution that budget owners will actually update and monitor.
[Learn More](https://getaleph.com/</solutions/budget-planning>)
### Modeling & Forecasting
Centralize all of your models, forecasts, and assumptions, making them easier to access, work with, and track changes.
[Learn More](https://getaleph.com/</solutions/financial-modeling-forecasting>)
### Headcount Planning
Automatically connect and reconcile cross-system data from your HRIS, ATS, and any other headcount spreadsheets.
[Learn More](https://getaleph.com/</solutions/headcount-planning>)
### Investor & Board Relations
Easily pull reports and put together presentations to keep your biggest stakeholders informed on where your business has been and where it is headed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6793c3d33fe0ed484e81f058_power-you-processes.avif)
real users, real results

### Discover Aleph today
Contact us and learn how Aleph can help you build your one source of truth for financial data.
[Get a demo](https://getaleph.com/</demo>)[Start a free trial](https://getaleph.com/</trial>)
![image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6778d1207e03199a243db62c_cta-image.webp)

## Start quickly, scale infinitely
Purpose-built to quickly meet finance teams where they are and take them to where they want to be.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6793bb3f42d23c59e44f7e2a_Dot%20BG.svg)
Discover your “aha moment” on day one
Skip the multi-month onboarding timelines that plague our industry. With Aleph, you’ll see the value on day one. No other solution can compete with what we deliver.
**Break free from your reliance on other teams**
Take full control over how you consolidate and work with cross-system data. No more waiting in queue for engineering or data teams to lend a helping hand. 
**Multiply your output with the same headcount**
Leverage cleaner data, automated reporting, and deeper insights to multiply your output and impact almost overnight without multiplying your headcount. 
"Implementing Aleph was insanely fast. We did all of our quarter-end reporting with Aleph less than 3 weeks after signing."
Chris Brubaker, 
VP of Finance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6793b97fdfd6c5c765c8a437_postscript_logo.svg.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67aa164fa9eab3e972acef51_679869f3051c640dae9d8267-chris-brubaker-67aa16157e306.webp)
## Automate the manual busywork, elevate the high-value strategic work
Eliminate the manual, time-consuming, error-prone processes that stand between you and the high-value strategic work you were hired to do. 
Book a demo⟨16⟩Start a free trial⟨18⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6793bb3f42d23c59e44f7e2a_Dot%20BG.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67aa3353427eccb05cf1795c_home-connect-and-sync-financial-data.webp)
Connect & SynC
**Build a single source of truth for cross-system data**
Connect all of your systems with 150+ no-code connectors that seamlessly sync your ERP, HRIS, CRM, and other cross-system data in real time.
Explore integrations⟨11⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/67aa33580f82e36ba4c3a937_98e08919e30822f706219a0745ccb34c_home-consolidate-and-tranform-financial-data.webp)
CONSOLIDATE & TRANSFORM
**Transform raw data into clean, ready-to-use data**
Give your data structure and purpose with smart logic to map fields, combine tables, run calculations, store metrics, and more.
Explore transformations⟨2⟩

Pivot Table⟨35⟩Custom Functions⟨36⟩Aleph Connect⟨37⟩SQL⟨38⟩
AUTOMATE & ANALYZE
Supercharge what is possible using Excel & Google Sheets
Keep using your existing reporting packages and models. Bi-directional spreadsheet add-ins sync your data in real time or on a schedule. Leverage data drill-downs to analyze and understand any cell or movement without ever having to leave your spreadsheets. 
Explore spreadsheet add-ins⟨3⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6797be2494272f91758596d5_4.avif)
VISUALIZE & SHARE
Bring your data to life with beautiful, interactive visualizations
Aggregate, spotlight, and share key metrics, trends, and answers across your business, giving stakeholders the visibility they need to stay on track and on target.
Explore dashboards⟨4⟩
"I've been born and bred in FP&A for almost 20 years, and kudos to Aleph who built the tool I've always wanted."
Brandon Sullivan,
CFO

# Power your processes with better, faster data
Unlock the confidence and process improvements you need to go from data to decision faster. 
### Financial Reporting & Close
Put your routine financial reporting and closing processes on autopilot, turning days of work into simple click-of-the-button tasks.
Learn More⟨6⟩
### Collaborative Budgeting
Streamline your budget planning and tracking processes with a collaborative solution that budget owners will actually update and monitor.
Learn More⟨8⟩
### Modeling & Forecasting
Centralize all of your models, forecasts, and assumptions, making them easier to access, work with, and track changes.
Learn More⟨7⟩
### Headcount Planning
Automatically connect and reconcile cross-system data from your HRIS, ATS, and any other headcount spreadsheets.
Learn More⟨9⟩
### Investor & Board Relations
Easily pull reports and put together presentations to keep your biggest stakeholders informed on where your business has been and where it is headed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6778d1207e03199a243dafef/6793c3d33fe0ed484e81f058_power-you-processes.avif)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Aleph**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator Batch S21, Aleph is headquartered in New York and has a compact team of 30 employees. Their mission? To create a single source of truth for financial data. If you’re in finance, you know the struggle of juggling data from multiple sources. Aleph addresses this by providing a no-code FP&A platform that syncs data seamlessly from over 150 integrations, allowing finance teams to automate processes like budgeting, forecasting, and reporting, all without a heavy lift from engineering.

**What They Do**

At its core, Aleph simplifies financial operations. Their platform is designed for those tired of the manual, error-prone tasks that often bog down finance teams. Instead of laboring over spreadsheet exports and consolidations, Aleph allows users to create real-time dashboards and models with ease. They highlight three major pillars:

1. **Data Consolidation**: Connect and transform source data using intuitive no-code tools.
